summary: Season 3 The combats remain thrilling and some of the arcs are compelling, but the characters are stagnant, the story is all...
caption:
Season 3

The combats remain thrilling and some of the arcs are compelling, but the characters are stagnant, the story is all over the place, and it’s all just kinda old hat at this point.

trail.content:
Season 3

The combats remain thrilling and some of the arcs are compelling, but the characters are stagnant, the story is all over the place, and it’s all just kinda old hat at this point.

summary: endeavor will lose his quirk and will fight dabi without it
title: endeavor will lose his quirk and will fight dabi without it
body:
I am one of the followers of the dabi is a todoroki theory

lingtosite . tumblr . com/post/146032879059 and in my reblog of @lingtosite post tododorkies . tumblr . com/post/166862156377/the-basics-of-the-todoroki-dabi-theory

Todoroki is basically a colder and more rebellious shounen manga version of Zuko from Avatar: The Last Airbender, beginning with a burn scar around his eye inflicted by a parent  and a kingly-looking fire-powered dad who doesn’t look all that approving of him. A dad who turns out to be an asshole.

plus  They both have  Fire powers, ,  and are attempting to gain the power to rise to the top and are receiving hated from those beneath them, and their mothers have been out of their lives for a long time.      

and zuko has an evil sibling named azula who has blue fire and feels that her mother thought she was a monster and dabi has blue flames and his relationship with his mother would be very strained  as  @vixenofthemist  said

vixenofthemist . tumblr . com/post/173754851834/you-know-what-i-just-realized-if-the-dabi

and both ozai and endeavor got into their marriages and had children as a some genetics experiment to breed strong children etc

and in the end of atla ozai had his bending taken away by aang so I think endeavor will get his quirk taken away  

edit: from

@hamliet

Hm, interesting! I didn’t make the connection with Ozai, but there are definitely a few in-story reasons to believe this might be the path the story will follow as well.

1) We know the villains have some of those Quirk-destroying bullets. Presumably if you were going to use them the #1 hero is probably the most likely target,

2) If Dabi is a Todoroki, taking away his father’s quirk when he discarded Dabi (if he is Tinyroki), Fuyumi, and Natsuo for not having perfect quirks would definitely be karmic and work with his motivations, and

plus in my hero illegals :

aizawa compared knuckleduster to endeavor and knckleduster is former prohero who lost his quirk and got his face split by all for one and endeavor currently has a scar on his face like knuckleduster and it turns out the villain who was  spreading trigger was his daughter/  a  bee user possessing his daughters body so knuckleduster had to fight his daughters ( and his relationship with his daughter was strained)  body    fighting against a quirk user without a quirk of his own ()  and dabi his son is currently a member of the league of villains and endeavor may have to fight and defeat dabi without using a quirk and relying on some tech to assist him

I think given that the manga compared endeavor to knuckleduster and later on it was revealed that the villain  was his daughter ( or at least using her body) and knuckleduster had to fight her  (not to mention him being a former pro hero who lost his quirk and got his face split  )

and the fact that enji has a scar on his face



 and I believe he will lose his quirk  

 makes me think we will get a parallel to this fight with dabi and enji

@waxwingedhawks

@hamliet

reblog.comment:

summary: Aizawa makes an online dating profile on a dare when he's drunk, starts crying about cats and wanting to adopt them all and gets...
body:
Aizawa makes an online dating profile on a dare when he’s drunk, starts crying about cats and wanting to adopt them all and gets upset that he can’t. Hizashi finds his video on his profile that Nemuri was kind enough to post for him, and remixes it into the “I love cats, I love every kind of cat” song and it goes viral. Aizawa hunts him down to confront him and gets tongue tied because Hizashi is exstatic to meet him and they accidentally hit it off.

In this fanfic I will-
